QuestData.Title: Recipe for Disaster
QuestData.Description: I need Zanzil's recipe, now more than ever. One of Zanzil's flunkies at the Ruins of Aboraz must have it on him. Head east, to the other coast of the Cape, and snatch it for me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Zanzil's Formulation from one of Zanzil's followers in the Ruins of Aboraz.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did he use shimmerweed? I'm guessing he used shimmerweed.$b$bNo wait... amberseeds! It's gotta be amberseeds.
QuestData.RewardText: This is fascinating! Just think of all the applications!$b$bJust so we're clear, I'm not thinking about using this to make an army of slaves or anything like that. No, no... I'm much more interested in the ogre explosions!
